storyTitle: As Employee, I want to receive notifications about schedule changes to stay informed

testCases.title: Validate notification generation on schedule change
preconditions: Admin user account exists and has permissions to modify schedules
Employee user account exists and is active in the system
Employee has an assigned schedule in the system
Web interface is accessible and functional

steps.action: Log in to the system as an admin user with valid credentials
steps.expectedResult: Admin is successfully authenticated and redirected to the admin dashboard

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule management section
steps.expectedResult: Schedule management interface is displayed with list of employees and their schedules

steps.action: Select the target employee's schedule from the list
steps.expectedResult: Employee's current schedule details are displayed and editable

steps.action: Modify the employee's schedule (change shift time, date, or assignment)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule modification form accepts the changes

steps.action: Save the schedule changes
steps.expectedResult: System confirms schedule update is saved successfully and a notification is generated for the employee

steps.action: Log out from the admin account
steps.expectedResult: Admin is successfully logged out

steps.action: Log in to the web interface as the employee whose schedule was changed
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and redirected to the employee dashboard

steps.action: Observe the notification area on the web interface
steps.expectedResult: Notification about the schedule change is displayed prominently (e.g., banner, badge, or notification icon with count)

steps.action: Click on the notification to view details
steps.expectedResult: Notification details are displayed showing the schedule change information (old vs new schedule)

steps.action: Click the acknowledge button on the notification
steps.expectedResult: Notification is marked as read, removed from the active notifications list, and confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Verify the notification is no longer in the active notifications list
steps.expectedResult: Notification counter decreases and the acknowledged notification is not visible in active list

postconditions: Schedule change is saved in the database
Notification is marked as read in the system
Notification is moved to notification history
Employee is aware of the schedule change

testCases.title: Verify notification delivery within 5 minutes
preconditions: Admin user account exists with schedule modification permissions
Employee user account exists and is active
System time is synchronized and accurate
Notification service is running and operational

steps.action: Log in to the system as an admin user
steps.expectedResult: Admin is successfully authenticated and can access schedule management

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule management section and select an employee's schedule
steps.expectedResult: Employee's schedule is displayed and ready for editing

steps.action: Note the current system time before making changes
steps.expectedResult: Current timestamp is recorded for reference

steps.action: Make a change to the employee's schedule (modify shift time or date)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule change is accepted by the system

steps.action: Save the schedule changes and note the exact time of save
steps.expectedResult: System confirms schedule is saved with timestamp displayed

steps.action: Wait for 1 minute after saving the schedule change
steps.expectedResult: Time elapses to 1 minute mark

steps.action: Verify notification generation in the backend system or database within 1 minute of schedule change
steps.expectedResult: Notification record is created in the system with timestamp within 1 minute of schedule change

steps.action: Log in to the web interface as the affected employee within 5 minutes of the schedule change
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and dashboard loads

steps.action: Check the notification area immediately upon login
steps.expectedResult: Notification about the schedule change is visible and accessible

steps.action: Verify the notification timestamp shows it was generated within 5 minutes of the schedule change
steps.expectedResult: Notification timestamp confirms delivery within the 5-minute SLA requirement

postconditions: Notification is successfully delivered within 5 minutes
Performance metric for notification delivery is met
Notification remains visible until acknowledged or dismissed

testCases.title: Ensure employees can dismiss notifications
preconditions: Employee user account exists and is logged in
At least one unread notification exists for the employee
Notification is displayed on the web interface

steps.action: Log in to the web interface as an employee with pending notifications
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and notification indicator shows unread notifications

steps.action: Navigate to the notifications section or click on the notification indicator
steps.expectedResult: List of notifications is displayed with details of schedule changes

steps.action: Select a specific notification to view its details
steps.expectedResult: Notification details are expanded showing full information about the schedule change

steps.action: Verify that a dismiss button or dismiss option is visible on the notification
steps.expectedResult: Dismiss button is clearly visible and accessible (e.g., 'Dismiss', 'X', or similar UI element)

steps.action: Click the dismiss button on the notification
steps.expectedResult: System processes the dismiss action and shows a brief confirmation (e.g., 'Notification dismissed')

steps.action: Verify the notification is removed from the active notifications list
steps.expectedResult: Dismissed notification is no longer visible in the active notifications area

steps.action: Check the notification counter or badge
steps.expectedResult: Notification count decreases by one, reflecting the dismissed notification

steps.action: Navigate to notification history (if available) to verify dismissed notification is archived
steps.expectedResult: Dismissed notification appears in history with 'dismissed' or 'read' status

steps.action: Refresh the page or log out and log back in
steps.expectedResult: Dismissed notification remains dismissed and does not reappear in active notifications

postconditions: Notification is marked as dismissed in the database
Notification is removed from active notifications list
Dismissed notification is stored in notification history
